ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Something nice for a friend
ygData.msgSnippet: I had spent the whole day camping Karnors waiting for Venril Sathir to spawn, to kill him for the staff for the Wizard epic, At 10pm I gave up. Half hour later
ygData.messageBody:
I had spent the whole day camping Karnors waiting for Venril Sathir to
spawn, to kill him for the staff for the Wizard epic, At 10pm I gave up.
Half hour later I get a phonecall from a fellow wizard in our guild saying
he had just spawned.
Nearly the whole guild turned out to kill him.
When he did actually drop the staff, I was about to give the guy in question
a tell saying lets roll for it, he shouted to the zone congratulations for
me.
I was speechless.

/hug United Kingdoms (Bristlebane)


-----Original Message-----
From: an_inspiration@... [mailto:an_inspiration@...]
Sent: 06 September 2001 16:41
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Something nice for a friend


What is the nicest thing someone has done for you in game?

A friend of mine has been showing me the ropes of EQ and, when I get
high enough, I want to repay him for his kindness. Looking for ideas.

Thanks all.

Lizz ~




Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
